attributes.title: Hard to control
attributes.review: This app is really hard to control. If you need news just watch a non bias channel on tv and not some bias presidents app. Stay safe and wear a mask to prevent the spread of corona. BLM.

attributes.title: This app is terrible !!!
attributes.review: I just wanted to support the president when the app glitched out. It glitched so much that I threw my phone AT A WALL and broke it. I wrote this review on my toaster. Now I have to fold my dogs and walk the laundry. DELETE THE APP.

attributes.title: disgusting and filthy
attributes.review: i was for you trump. i was rooting for you. i had trump 2020 tampons, pads and bras for you. but this app has made me change my views. i wamtsd to write something funny but not creative sooo im here to say trump is a misogynistic , egotistical white supremacist male. you’re absolutely horrible and racist and i hope someone takes one for the team and yanno. like the old days. anyways vote for many🧚🏽‍♂️🌿🥰✨💕

attributes.title: A joke
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for fun and it makes you agree to getting automated phone calls and text messages. Also Trump is not a good president

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Horrible app. The little girl from the ring came out of my phone with a trump mask and queefed all over my family before killing them.

I am in shock. Literally, my phone shocked me. I thought it was those darn genz saying that downloading the app may shock you & “try at your own risk” but who would’ve known.. this app is really cursed 😔 🧚🏼✨

attributes.title: 🧚horrible service✨
attributes.review: This app is terrible! You even have to log in for this, horrible service can’t do anything!

attributes.title: Eww
attributes.review: Like this app is horrible. I downloaded it and it made me vomit. I literally got the coronavirus because of it. Also this app kept making sexist and sexualized comments. This app spreads lies. It’s really bad. 🤮🤮🤮

I wanted to just have someone 😀 finally ask me if I’m having a good day 😚 for once 😔 but instead 🤔 I was greeted with little chief bunker boy himself 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮 do not make the same mistake I did y’all 😭😭🤬🤬🤢🤢🤮😷

attributes.title: These THUGS🤬🤬
attributes.review: I downloaded this application in support for our leader/dictator but I HATED IT. It asked for my phone number and it won’t let me use the app cause I don’t want to enter my phone number😠
